scripts.deploy:build: npm run build && echo Build complete! Ready for deployment. Upload contents of 'out' directory to Plesk.
scripts.deploy:check: node -e "const fs = require('fs'); const out = './out'; if (!fs.existsSync(out)) { console.error('‚ùå out/ directory not found. Run npm run build first.'); process.exit(1); } const files = fs.readdirSync(out); console.log('‚úÖ Build found with', files.length, 'items'); console.log('üìÅ Main files:', files.slice(0, 10).join(', '));"
